about_the_game:
Dead for Dread is an exciting game in which you take on the role of a brave hero who goes into the dark labyrinths to retrieve a stolen artifact. Embark on a dangerous journey through mysterious dungeons full of mysteries and sinister creatures. You have to explore intricate corridors, fight monsters to get to the final goal.

Arm yourself with a powerful blade, powerful spells and go destroy monsters! On your way you will meet a variety of enemies that will force you to give it your all. Various tasks await you at the locations, after completing which you will advance through the game’s plot and get closer and closer to the ending.

The game is 2D with roguelike elements, you need to destroy enemies and move further through locations.

Your adventure is just beginning. Are you ready to go on a dangerous adventure?
